name: SHMAPE
description:
A minimalistic vertical shmup with shapes (no sprites) made with pygame for the Basic Shmup Showcase.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys to move
  • X to shoot
  • C to bomb
  • X to change a value in menus
  • Z to go back in menus

This is a work in progress.

Some issues I'm aware of:

  • some enemies are in more random configurations than others. I'm working on finding a balance between orderly and chaotic.
  • there is some slowdown at the boss. I'm working on improving the collisions for it.
  • some menu buttons don't have all the proper "neighbors". You're better off using the mouse to change values.
  • the keyboard buttons should be configurable, but they're not at the moment

Let me know what I can improve in the comments :)
